message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to go for that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. What do you think?
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. This is my final offer
I've thought about it, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Sorry Bob, but I think I've been too generous already. I'm not willing to go back to $100. I'll stick with my previous offer of $110. That's my final price.
